p: We found that the 2004-2005 and 2007-2008 seasons had relatively long epidemic periods while the 2002-2003 and 2008-2009 seasons had relatively short epidemics ( Fig 2). At the region-level, the Atlanta region (HHS Region 4) had longer epidemics ( e .2 â‰ˆ 1.22 times the length of those in other regions) (Fig AE and Fig AF in S1 Appendix).
